Original:
有格調又適合約會的酒吧這裡找。

有別於中山站或林森北路一帶、以日式風格為主的酒吧，這間在晶華酒店正旁邊的 Bar Freedom 走比較現代時尚的路線，無論在裝潢或燈光上都非常有質感。除了吧台座位區外，還有高腳桌椅跟包廂空間，甚至連洗手間都很有設計感。

酒單上以編號呈現，簡單列出材料。整體來說酒算是中規中矩，但甜度真的稍高了些，點酒時可以先提醒一下調酒師。若是對於調酒的細節或層次感非常追求的人，這裡不會是該區域的首選。

No.1 Roku 琴酒、紫蘇、話梅
很清爽的一杯 Gin Fizz twist，氣泡將些許的紫蘇香氣稍做放大，挺適合開場。但若能夠再更酸甜平衡先會好一些，尤其是話梅泡久了、鹹度析出後，會讓整杯的味道過度複雜。

No.7 伯爵茶琴酒、萬壽菊、葡萄
雖然喝得到伯爵茶淡淡的微澀茶感，但葡萄的甜味有點搶去了該有的層次。不至於到不好喝，只是比較偏妹酒，對於無法接受酒感太重的人來說可能是好選擇。

No.5 鳳梨茶琴酒、苦艾酒、Suze
有點結合了 Negroni 跟 White Negroni 的概念，雖然上桌後看起來還是因為 Vermouth 關係比較偏深色。風味上也還是更接近 Negroni，但帶有多一些 Suze 的草本風味，加上有點微酸香氣的基底，算當天最有深度的一杯酒。

三種情況或許可以來訪：
1) 這裡的氛圍感很適合剛開始約會的一對，特別是吧台由上打下來的聚光燈，拍起照也好看。
2) 包廂沙發區滿適合好友相聚，整個空間是舒服有格調的，久坐閒聊非常自在。
3) 附近畢竟有很多其他酒吧，剛好要等位子前來 pre-drink 個一兩杯還算 OK。
EN:
There are styles and are suitable for dating bars.

Different from the Japanese -based bar, the Japanese style, the Japanese style is mainly based on the Japanese style. The BAR FREEDOM next to the Jinghua Hotel is a more modern and stylish route, which is very textured in terms of decoration or lighting.In addition to the bar seat area, there is also a high table, chair and box space, and even the toilet is very designed.

The wine list is presented in the number, and the materials are simply listed.Overall, the wine is quite satisfactory, but the sweetness is really slightly higher. When you order, you can remind the bartender first.If it is a person who is very pursuing the details or layers of bartender, it will not be the first choice of the area.

NO.1 Roku piano wine, perilla, plum
A very refreshing cup of Gin Fizz Twist, the bubbles increase the aroma of the perilla, which is very suitable for opening.However, if it can be more sweet and sour, it will be better first, especially when the plum is soaked and the saltiness is precipitated, the taste of the entire cup will be too complicated.

NO.7 Earl tea piano wine, Wanshouju, grape
Although I was drinking the slightly slightly astringent tea of ​​the count, the sweetness of the grapes snatched the level.It is not enough to taste it, but it is more sisters. It may be a good choice for people who cannot accept the wine.

No.5 pineapple tea piano wine, bitter wine, Suze
It is a bit combined with the concept of Negroni and White Negroni. Although it looks like the Vermouth relationship is relatively dark after serving.The flavor is still closer to Negroni, but with a little SUZE herbal flavor, and a base with a slightly sour aroma, counting the most in -depth glass of wine on the day.

Three cases may be visited:
1) The sense of atmosphere here is very suitable for the pair of dating, especially the spotlights that are hit from top, and take pictures.
2) The sofa area of ​​the box is suitable for friends. The entire space is comfortable and stylish.
3) After all, there are many other bars nearby, just to wait for the seat to come to Pre-Drink a one or two cups.

Original:
台北的自由酒吧將充滿活力的氛圍、創意雞尾酒和卓越的服務融為一體，使其成為城市繁華夜生活場所的絕佳選擇。

踏入 Bar Freedom 酒吧，您會立即被其不拘一格且誘人的氛圍所震撼。酒吧將工業別緻的裝飾與舒適、親密的座位安排融為一體。柔和的燈光和優雅的裝飾營造出溫馨輕鬆的氛圍，非常適合在漫長的一天後放鬆身心或開始夜晚的外出。

自由酒吧的雞尾酒菜單令人印象深刻，提供各種創新和經典的選擇。這裡的調酒師都是真正的藝術家，他們巧妙地調製出既美觀又美味的飲料。出色的雞尾酒包括“自由鐘”（杜松子酒、接骨木花和柑橘的清爽混合酒）和“自由菲茲”（伏特加、百香果和香檳的令人愉悅的混合物）。每杯飲料都經過精心平衡和精心呈現。

Bar Freedom 的工作人員友好、細心且知識淵博。他們花時間確保每位客人擁有良好的體驗，無論是推薦飲品、客製化適合您口味的雞尾酒，還是只是進行愉快的交談。他們的專業精神和對工藝的真誠熱情增強了整個訪問的樂趣。

自由酒吧吸引了從當地人到遊客的各種活躍人群，他們都希望享受酒吧的獨特產品。這裡的氛圍樂觀而悠閒，是休閒聚會和節慶聚會的好去處。音樂精心策劃，與氣氛相得益彰，但又不會壓倒對話。
EN:
The free bar in Taipei integrates a vibrant atmosphere, creative cocktails and excellent services, making it an excellent choice for the bustling nightlife in the city.

Stepping into the Bar Freedom bar, you will be immediately shocked by its eclectic and seductive atmosphere.The bar integrates industrial unique decoration with a comfortable and intimate seat arrangement.The soft light and elegant decoration create a warm and relaxed atmosphere, which is very suitable for relaxing the body and mind or starting at night after a long day.

The cocktails of free bars are impressive, providing various innovation and classic choices.The bartender here is a real artist, and they cleverly adjust the beautiful and delicious drinks.The excellent cocktails include "free bells" (refreshing mixed wine of Du Songzi wine, bone wood flowers and citrus) and "free Fitz" (pleasant mixture of vodka, passion fruit and champagne).Each drink is carefully balanced and carefully presented.

Bar Freedom's staff is friendly, careful and knowledgeable.They spend time to ensure that each guest has a good experience. Whether it is a cocktail that recommends drinks and customized for your taste, it is just a pleasant conversation.Their professional spirit and sincerity and enthusiasm for craftsmanship have enhanced the fun of the entire visit.

The free bar has attracted various active people from locals to tourists, and they all want to enjoy the unique products of the bar.The atmosphere here is optimistic and leisurely. It is a good place for leisure and festivals.The music is carefully planned and complement the atmosphere, but it will not overwhelm the dialogue.

Original: 「我參加了兩天的會議，住在台北麗晶酒店。令人驚訝的是，就在飯店旁邊，我找到了最好的酒吧。我連續兩個晚上都去了這些酒吧，調酒師很熱情地歡迎我，很專業，很友好，很感激地照顧我。他們為我提供了很多飲料選擇，氣氛舒適，空調良好，還有美味的爆米花。我嘗試了一些內格羅尼、烏龍茶雞尾酒，還有調酒師提供的一些特色菜。令人驚訝的是，成本被接受且很低。酒吧營業至深夜，對此深表讚賞。如果你來台北的話我強烈推薦這個地方。
EN: "I attended a two -day meeting and lived in Licheng Hotel, Taipei. Surprisingly, just next to the hotel, I found the best bar. I went to these bars for two consecutive nights. Welcome to me warmly, very professional, friendly, and grateful to take care of me. There are some special dishes provided by the bartender. It is surprising that the cost is accepted and low.

Original:
我在附近散步時偶然發現的。
我通常不去酒吧，所以有點緊張，不過我覺得價格還是比較合理的。
最重要的是，飲料和小吃都很美味，氣氛也很棒。

我不認為這是一個可以和一大群人一起玩得很開心的地方，而是一個可以和一小群人一起喝一杯或作為情侶順便過來的地方。
店員也很有禮貌。
EN:
I accidentally discovered when I was walking nearby.
I usually don't go to the bar, so I am a little nervous, but I think the price is quite reasonable.
The most important thing is that drinks and snacks are delicious and the atmosphere is great.

I don't think this is a place where you can play with a large group of people, but a place where you can drink a drink with a small group or be a couple by the way.
The clerk is also very polite.

Original: 我最近有幸參觀了自由酒吧，這次經歷絕對讓我震驚！從我走進去的那一刻起，這裡的氛圍就很吸引人，工作人員非常友好和細心。然而，真正搶盡風頭的是飲料——每一種都比上一種更獨特、更美味！ Bar Freedom 的調酒師是真正的工匠，他們調製出的調酒既具有視覺衝擊力，又充滿風味。無論您是雞尾酒鑑賞家還是只是想嘗試一些新鮮刺激的東西，Bar Freedom 都是必去的目的地。我極力推薦它—五顆星！
EN: I have been fortunate to visit the free bar recently. This experience definitely shocked me!From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere here was very attractive, and the staff was very friendly and careful.However, it is a drink that really grabs the storm -each one is more unique and delicious than the previous one!Bar Freedom's bartender is a real craftsman. The bartending they prepared is both visual impact and flavor.Whether you are a cocktail appreciation or just trying to try some fresh and exciting things, Bar Freedom is a must -visit destination.I strongly recommend it -five stars!

Original: 發現一隻蟑螂走得很靠近吧台上的食物。工作人員把它擦掉了，只說了聲抱歉。我們對服務感到失望。我們相信所有顧客都非常重視衛生和服務問題。
EN: I found a cockroach that was close to the food on the bar.The staff wiped it off, only to say sorry.We are disappointed with services.We believe that all customers attach great importance to health and service issues.

Original:
我在這裡的經歷非常複雜。  我來的第一晚是週四晚/週五早，凌晨 1 點左右。  我剛入住附近的麗晶酒店，經過幾個小時的飛行（有延誤！），很高興發現這家酒吧仍然營業。  調酒師很友好，但不太健談，調製的飲料很棒。  真的非常適合放鬆。  我喝了幾杯酒，給了很多小費，並計劃將其作為本週的常規停留。

第二天晚上我的經歷完全相反。  前一天晚上的調酒師走了，取而代之的是散發出老闆/經理氛圍的人。  當我走進去時，他上下打量了我，然後問我是否有預訂。  當我回答沒有時，他問我是否獨自一人。  我確認我是。  然後他帶我經過酒吧裡所有的空位，讓我坐在後面的角落，在一些酒吧設備後面，所以顯然我不會被任何人看到，然後告訴我我只會從他那裡點菜。  不友善，沒有笑容，幾乎有點威脅。

當我坐下後，我發現與其他顧客相比，我的穿著相當隨意，但穿著馬球衫和短褲，所以不太邋遢。  如果他只是告訴我那天晚上有著裝要求，我就可以離開了，但我真的很煩惱，顯然他很樂意拿我的錢，但顯然他真的不希望我在那裡。  我來台灣幾十年了，還是第一次遇到這種態度。

不管怎樣，我不知道我做了什麼值得這個傢伙冷落，但我不建議來這裡。  真遺憾——我真的很享受我的第一個晚上，但第二天晚上毀了我最初的印象。
EN:
My experience here is very complicated.The first night I came was Thursday evening/Friday morning, around 1 am.I just stayed in the nearby Licheng Hotel, after a few hours of flight (delay!), I was glad to find that the bar is still open.The bartender is very friendly, but it is not talkative, and the modulated drink is great.It's really suitable for relaxation.I drank a few glasses of wine, gave a lot of tips, and planned to make it this week's regular stay.

My experience the next night is the opposite.The bartender the night before was gone, and replaced it with the atmosphere of the boss/manager.When I walked in, he looked at me up and down, and then asked me if I had a booking.When I answered, he asked me if I was alone.I confirm that I am.Then he took me through all the empty positions in the bar and asked me to sit in the corner behind, behind some bar equipment, so obviously I would not be seen by anyone, and then told me that I would only order from him.Not friendly, no smile, almost a bit threatened.

When I sat down, I found that compared with other customers, I was very casual, but wearing a polo shirt and shorts, so I was not very embarrassed.If he just told me that I had dressing requirements that night, I could leave, but I was really troubled. Obviously he was happy to take my money, but obviously he really didn't want me to be there.I have been in Taiwan for decades, and I have encountered this attitude for the first time.

Anyway, I don't know what I did worthy of this guy, but I don't recommend coming here.Unfortunately -I really enjoyed my first night, but the next night I destroyed my original impression.

Original: 涼爽的氛圍和令人驚嘆的雞尾酒。老闆說話超酷，也調出了我在台北喝過的最好的馬丁尼酒之一。個人最喜歡的是No.3。
EN: The cool atmosphere and amazing cocktail.The boss spoke so cool, and also called out one of the best Martini I drank in Taipei.Personal favorite is No.3.
